event.title: arrived at the spot by chance in 1523

data.event: The Portuguese Diogo de Melo arrived at the spot by chance in 1523, when heading towards Ormuz but caught in a violent storm and having his boat blown towards the coast of Daman.
Soon after it was settled as a Portuguese colony and remained so for over 400 years.
It still stands today, most of it preserved in its original form.

event.title: Today the majority of the municipal government offices are situated

data.event: Today the majority of the municipal government offices are situated inside this fort.
